body.p: Time to heat up those CPUs, Gentoo Linux 1.4_rc3 has been released! You can find LiveCDs, and stage tarballs at our master mirror. At this time, our release includes basic x86 builds, PowerPC support for generic PowerPC, G3 and G4 systems, and Sparc and UltraSparc support. For this release, our documentation team has worked hard to bring you updated x86 installation documentation, PPC installation documentation, and Sparc/UltraSparc installation documentation so don't forget to check those out for all of your installation needs.

There have been many changes since the 1.4_rc2 release, and we encourage all users to both test and use this release. The most notable change in this release is the updated LiveCD, which is much more accesible and functional. Additionally, this release does not include GRP builds, this release is "lean" in general. The excluded features will be present in the 1.4_final release. As usual, if any problems are encountered with the install, please check the Gentoo Linux Forums, and if no answer is found there, please check our bug database.
Thanks to all who have contributed to the 1.4_rc3 release, and we hope to build upon this and have a great 1.4_final!
